title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: This exam covers the fundamental concepts of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving techniques.
instructions: Read each question carefully. Answer all multiple-choice questions by selecting the best option. Short answer questions should be concise and relevant.

title: Advanced Mathematics
description: The exam will test your knowledge of advanced calculus, linear algebra, and differential equations.
instructions: You may use a calculator, but no other aids. Show your work for all short answer and fill-in-the-blank questions.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This exam focuses on key data structures like arrays, linked lists, trees, and graph algorithms.
instructions: Answer all questions to the best of your ability. Make sure to explain your reasoning for short answer and fill-in-the-blank questions.

title: Software Engineering
description: The exam evaluates your understanding of software development life cycles, Agile methodologies, and design patterns.
instructions: Answer all multiple-choice and short answer questions. The use of notes is not permitted.

title: Database Management Systems
description: Test your knowledge of SQL, relational database design, and normalization in this comprehensive exam.
instructions: Complete all questions. Write SQL queries for the fill-in-the-blank section. Diagrams may be used for certain questions.

title: Operating Systems
description: This exam covers topics including process management, memory management, and file systems.
instructions: Ensure you understand all questions before answering. For short answer questions, explain each concept clearly.

title: Introduction to Networking
description: An exam on network protocols, IP addressing, and TCP/IP models.
instructions: Answer all questions thoroughly. Multiple choice questions require only one correct answer.

title: Machine Learning
description: This exam tests your understanding of supervised, unsupervised learning, and algorithms like regression and clustering.
instructions: Please answer all questions carefully. Make sure your answers are supported with examples for short answer questions.

title: Introduction to AI
description: This exam covers foundational concepts in Artificial Intelligence, including search algorithms and neural networks.
instructions: Multiple choice and fill-in-the-blank questions must be completed within the time limit.

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: The exam covers key topics such as encryption, network security, and ethical hacking.
instructions: No external references allowed. All answers should be concise, particularly for short answer questions.

title: Web Development
description: Test your knowledge on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive web design in this exam.
instructions: Read all questions carefully. Provide code snippets for the fill-in-the-blank section where required.

title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: This exam will cover cloud computing models such as IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, and cloud security principles.
instructions: Ensure you have reviewed all lessons on cloud models. Answer all multiple-choice and fill-in-the-blank questions.

title: Software Testing
description: The exam focuses on unit testing, integration testing, and the use of automated testing tools.
instructions: Answer each question to the best of your knowledge. Provide examples for short answer questions.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: This exam will assess your knowledge of mobile development frameworks, native vs. hybrid apps, and UI/UX design.
instructions: Code snippets are expected in the fill-in-the-blank section. Answer short answer questions clearly.

title: DevOps Fundamentals
description: The exam covers continuous integration, continuous deployment, and automation in software development.
instructions: Answer multiple-choice questions and provide concise answers for fill-in-the-blank questions.

title: Digital Marketing
description: This exam tests your knowledge of SEO, content marketing, and social media strategies.
instructions: Answer all questions completely. Ensure that your answers are practical and backed by examples where possible.

title: Data Science
description: Test your knowledge of data science techniques, statistical analysis, and data visualization tools.
instructions: Answer all questions, paying attention to the required format for short answer questions.

title: Blockchain Technology
description: This exam covers blockchain basics, consensus mechanisms, and smart contracts.
instructions: Read each question carefully and ensure thorough explanations for short answer questions.

title: Artificial Neural Networks
description: The exam covers the theory and application of neural networks, including backpropagation and activation functions.
instructions: Answer multiple-choice questions. For fill-in-the-blank questions, provide formulas where necessary.

title: Introduction to Statistics
description: This exam covers basic statistical concepts such as probability, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis.
instructions: Answer all multiple-choice questions and provide detailed solutions for short answer questions.
